title: Aight Morde players, I'ma need you to be reasonable for a second
body:
Do you really think that this interaction:

https://imgur.com/DwgVMbw

https://imgur.com/rPZQJIa

Is okay?

---
---

For those of you who don't know, Morde treats non-minions (e.g. pets) the exact same as champions. This means that for instance using W on 2 of Yorick's Ghouls will heal him as if he just hit 2 champions with the ability.

Note that this level of healing rivals Nunu's Q (and usually grants his entire shield bar since his shield conversion treats pets as champions too!).

Nunu's Q: 75 / 120 / 165 / 210 / 255 (+ 70% AP) (+ 10% bonus health)
Morde's W: 100 / 170 / 240 / 310 / 380 (+ 60% AP)

---

If this interaction was removed, the healing from ghouls alone would be:

25 / 42.5 / 60 / 77.5 / 95 (+ 15% AP)

However he could still catch Yorick (or any other pet user) in his W *like what the intended use of this ability is supposed to be* and heal:

62.5 / 106.25 / 150 / 193.75 / 237.5 (+ 37.5% AP)

> Edit:
>
> Alright guys, I'm seeing a vast majority of the comments defending this interaction saying something along the lines of "Mordekaiser is bad, let him have this".
>
> Just because a champion is weak is not an excuse to allow a broken interaction such as this to exist.
>
> I'm aware other broken interactions exist, once again, not the point. We're talking about *this* interaction right now.
